DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 2-way crossover study evaluate effect AMG 151 24-hour ambulatory blood pressure glucose level subject type 2 diabetes mellitus stable regimen metformin alone , metformin dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor ( DPP4 ) , metformin thiazolidinedione ( TZD ) , metformin , DPP4 , TZD minimum 3 month prior randomization .
DOC.brief_title: Investigate Effect AMG 151 24-hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure & Glucose Levels Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects type 2 diabetes mellitus On stable regimen metformin alone , metformin DPP4 , metformin TZD , metformin , DPP4 , TZD minimum 3 month prior randomization Body mass index > 25 < 45 kg/m2 Hemoglobin A1c level ≥ 7.0 % ≤ 11.0 % screen Fasting Cpeptide level ≥ 0.2 nmol/L screen Subject history hypertension must stable antihypertensive treatment ( ) ( type medication , dose , regimen ) least 6 week prior first dose investigational product Other criterion may apply Exclusion Criteria Subject type 1 diabetes mellitus history type 1 diabetes mellitus Subject 2 emergency room visit hospitalization due poor glucose control 6 month prior screen Poorly control hypertension define diastolic pressure ≥ 95 mmHg systolic ≥ 155 mmHg ( confirm repeat assessment ) screen Triglycerides ≥ 400 mg/dL ( 4.52 mmol/L ) screening Use know cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) inducer within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) , prior receive first dose investigational product .
